content.raw:
Oh I see, I was just not thinking in terms of deb packages. I guess in that case the dependencies will be taken care of. 

I think this would only break builds for people building branch `sdf4` from source who don't have `ign-math3` installed in their system, correct?

Do you think it's a lot of trouble to support both math 2 and 3?
content.html:
Oh I see, I was just not thinking in terms of deb packages. I guess in that case the dependencies will be taken care of.

I think this would only break builds for people building branch sdf4 from source who don't have ign-math3 installed in their system, correct?

Do you think it's a lot of trouble to support both math 2 and 3?
